Slobodan Praljak
  • Umwhile Bosnie Croat airmy general Slobodan Praljak (picturt) dees frae drinkin pushion efter his conviction for war crimes is upheld bi the ICTY.
  • In sumo, yokozuna Harumafuji Kōhei reteers amidst investigations intae an assault on fellae warstler Takanoiwa Yoshimori.
  • Indonesie offeecials order the evacuation o 100,000 fowk in Bali due tae the eruption o Moont Agung.
  • In Canadian fitbaa, the Toronto Argonauts defeat the Calgary Stampeders tae win the Grey Cup.
  • At least 305 fowk are killed in a terrorist attack on a mosque in Bir al-Abed, Egyp.
